diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Neurocutaneous Melanosis associated with Autoimmune Diabetes Mellitus
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The diagnosis was supported by the presence of numerous congenital melanocytic nevi, hyperglycemia, elevated hemoglobin A1c, and cytological findings of atypical melanocytes consistent with malignant melanoma. Additionally, diffuse leptomeningeal enhancement was observed on MRI, confirming the presence of CNS melanoma.
